des:
"Introducing the smart and convenient EasyRoll Smart Blinds. EasyRoll Smart Blinds uses a Wi-Fi-based smart motorized system, making it easy for anyone to install and use. With user-friendly controls, you can manage one or multiple blinds individually or simultaneously. It is compatible with various platforms, and with Alexa integration, you can set up automation according to your routines for even more convenience.

The available functions are: "Move to Top", "Move to Bottom", "Percentage Movement".

1) "Move to Top" moves the blinds to the top position set on the device.
 - For example : Alexa, Raise the [Your blind name] blind.
 Alexa, Open the [Your blind name] blind. 
2) "Move to Bottom" moves the blinds to the bottom position set on the device.
 - For example: Alexa, Lower the [Your blind name] blind.
 Alexa, Close the [Your blind name] blind.
3) "Percentage Movement" moves the length from the top to the bottom, ranging from 0 to 100 percent. It can be moved in increments of 1%.
 - For example: Alexa, [Your blind name] blind to 100 percent (Move to Bottom)
 [Your blind name] blind to 0 percent (Move to Top)
 [Your blind name] blind to 51 percent (Move to 51percent)


How to Use the Easyroll:

1. Install blinds equipped with EasyRoll motor.
2. Download and install EasyrollPlus from the AppStore or PlayStore.
3. Register as a member and register the device through the Easyroll app.
4. Press 'Add Device' in the Alexa app and search for Easyroll.
5. Enter the registered ID and password from the EasyrollPlus app to connect Alexa and Easyroll.
6. Set up the blinds connected to Alexa according to their names and zones.
7. Use with Alexa voice commands or according to your routines."
